movies.title: The Hoax
movies.plot: In what would cause a fantastic media frenzy, Clifford Irving sells his bogus biography of Howard Hughes to a premiere publishing house in the early 1970s.

events.title: Howard Hughes takes part in a conference call where he denies any knowledge of Clifford Irving

movies.title: Gangs of New York
movies.plot: It's 1863. America was born in the streets. Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points of America to seek vengeance against the psychotic gangland kingpin, Bill the Butcher, who murdered his father years earlier. With an eager pickpocket by his side and a whole new army, Vallon fights his way to seek vengeance on the Butcher and restore peace in the area.
movies.awards: Nominated for 10 Oscars. Another 50 wins & 124 nominations.

events.title: Priest Fallon is killed by Bill the Butcher
the Dead Rabbits fight the Natives

movies.title: The Aviator
movies.plot: A biopic depicting the life of filmmaker and aviation pioneer Howard Hughes from 1927 to 1947, during which time he became a successful film producer and an aviation magnate, while simultaneously growing more unstable due to severe obsessive-compulsive disorder.

studios.title: IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. 3. Produktions KG

events.title: Howard Hughes breaks the world landplane speed record in his H-1 Racer
Howard Hughes lands after flying around the world in four days
Howard Hughes crashes his prototype Hughes XF-11 plane
Howard Hughes flies the Hughes H-4 Hercules, known as the "Spruce Goose"

movies.title: Cinderella Man
movies.plot: The true story of boxer Jim Braddock who, in the 1920’s following his retirement, makes a surprise comeback in order to get him and his family out of a socially poor state.
movies.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 42 nominations.

events.title: James J. Braddock beats Max Baer

movies.title: Hollywoodland
movies.plot: The complicated life and controversial suicide of George Reeves is investigated by a fictional private detective who finds that there are reasons to suspect that Reeves may not have killed himself after all. The detective also finds that there is a little of George Reeves in himself, and maybe, each of us.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 7 nominations.

movies.title: Finding Neverland
movies.plot: During a writing slump, playwright J.M. Barrie meets a widow and her three children—who soon become an important part of Barrie’s life and the inspiration that lead him to create his masterpiece. Peter Pan'.
